sentences.sentence: Mary gave her a sheepish grin.
sentences.translation: 玛丽难为情地冲她咧嘴一笑。

sentences.sentence: I asked him why. He looked a little sheepish when he answered.
sentences.translation: 我问他为什么。他回答时看起来有点困窘。

sentences.sentence: Tom was tugging at a button-hole and looking sheepish.
sentences.translation: 汤姆拽着一个钮扣孔，一副害羞的样子。
